definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: Over the past 10-plus years, the booming tourist industry has stimulated the Great wall's renovation project.
sentences.chinese: 十幾年來，蓬勃發展的旅遊業促進了長城的修繕工程。

sentences.english: Someone needs to fix the leg press machine.
sentences.chinese: 得有人來修繕一下壓腿機。

sentences.english: Extensive repair work is being carried out.
sentences.chinese: 大規模的修繕工作正在進行。

sentences.english: In the recently 10-plus years, the booming tourism industry in China has prompted the Great wall's renovation project.
sentences.chinese: 十幾年來，蓬勃發展的旅遊業促進了長城的修繕工程。

sentences.english: He also paved roads, repaired houses, made loans to people in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 他還築了路，修繕房屋，借貸給困難中的人。

sentences.english: It was built in 1535 and restored during the Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 它建於1535年清朝年間曾重新修繕過。

sentences.english: The competition arena is badly in need of repairs.
sentences.chinese: 這個比賽場地急待修繕。

sentences.english: Before we can get into the mountain, just near the village, we saw two pretty constructed tombs.
sentences.chinese: 剛出村還沒進山，見得兩座修繕得挺好的新墓。

sentences.english: And the northern section will mainly receive a facelift as it is designed to be a commercial street.
sentences.chinese: 而路的北段被定位爲商業街區，沿路建築將修繕一新。

sentences.english: I pointed at a half-collapsed rampart nearby and asked if they planned to restore it too.
sentences.chinese: 我指着附近半倒塌的部分問到他們是否計劃修繕。

sentences.english: We shall have to fix the house up before we can sell it.
sentences.chinese: 我們得把房子修繕了後才能出售。

sentences.english: As with all makeovers, it seemed a good idea at the time.
sentences.chinese: 當時，修繕金字塔似乎還是個不錯的主意。

sentences.english: Before the new owners were to take over, my Father did some repair work inside.
sentences.chinese: 新房東搬進去之前，父親進去做了一些修繕的工作。

sentences.english: In Orange County, California, they’ll renovate homes for our veterans.
sentences.chinese: 在加州的橘子郡，他們還將爲退伍軍人修繕房屋。

sentences.english: I'm very grateful to Master Cheng Yen for giving me this new roof.
sentences.chinese: 屋主石正光表示，非常感謝上人，給我修繕這個屋頂。

sentences.english: Many old buildings in Beijing have been renovated and restored to their former glory (or splendour).
sentences.chinese: 北京許多古建築已經修繕一新，恢復了舊觀。

definition: to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
to demolish a building and relocate the inhabitants
